name: Polar Jam – animal cub rescue
description:
Welcome to the South Pole! After a long polar winter night, it’s time for summer. All the baby animals are out to play in the sun while their parents are off in search of food. But the fun doesn’t last because summer is when the poachers come to snatch up the animal cubs in their cages! The cubs have no choice but to try and run, but the poachers are fast and get angry when the cubs try to flee. Use your skills to break through the polar ice and sink the poachers into the frozen arctic water and save the lives of the native baby penguins, seals, foxes and bears.
The poachers are approaching fast!
There’s no time to wait – go stop them!

Features
1. Rescue adorable baby animal cubs.
2. Smash the ice under poacher's feet with a swipe of your finger.
3. Get bonuses for sinking objects in the environment.
4. Stop the poachers by any means necessary.
5. Liberate the baby animals from the cages.
6. Save the cubs to from the icy cold water.
7. Get daily bonuses and use them to stop the poachers.
8. Enjoy the adorable baby animals and their cute animations.
9. Become the best animal rescuer among your friends!
